import React, { useEffect } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import Rating from "../components/Rating" import { listProductDetails } from "../actions/productActions" const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const product = [] return ( <> Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"} ) } export default ProductScreen
